Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC=1.6 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538p (MIC=3.1 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermis ATCC 12228 (MIC=3.1 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus ATCC 10240 (MIC=3.1 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Shigella dysentariae ATCC 9752 (MIC=12.5 µg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031 (MIC=50 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: De novo generation of antimicrobial LK peptides with a single tryptophan at the critical amphipathic interface.
Literature.Author: Kang SJ, Won HS, Choi WS, Lee BJ.
